install.description:
JA Tabs Plugin

Introduce:

JA Tabs plugin is a plugin help you to create tabs in any positions in the Joomla!

Features:

  1. Support multi types of content: Module Position, Module name, HTML Content, Articles Ids, Category Id
  2. Configurable animations: Left/right, up/down, fading...
  3. Multi themes support
  4. Multi Languages
  5. Full of configuration

Usage Instructions:

Parameter Options General:

All parameter options for the Ja Tabs Plugin.

  1. type:
    (modules, module, content, articles). The Ja Tabs typing.
  2. position:
    (top, left, right, bottom). Positon of the tabs. Value default is top.
  3. style:
    The JaTabs styling (basic). Value default is basic.
  4. width:
    Width of the tabs. It can be fixed or automatically. Example: empty or '100%' or '600'
  5. height:
    Height of the tabs. It can be fixed or automatically. Example: empty or 'auto' or '400'.
  6. widthTabs:
    Width of the tabs. It should be 'empty' for the 'Top/Bottom' position of tabs title and fixed (like '150') for the 'Left/Right' position of tabs title.
  7. heightTabs:
    Height of the tabs. It should be 'empty' for 'Left/Right' position of tabs title and fixed (like '30' for 'Top/Bottom' position of tabs title.
  8. duration (ms):
    Time interval of the transition effect when autoplay is on in milliseconds. Value default is 1000.
  9. animType:
    (animFade, animMoveHor, animMoveVir, none). Define the transition effect for the autoplay. Value default is animMoveVir.
  10. mouseType:
    (click, mouseover, none). Action behavior of the control panel. Value default is click.
  11. skipAnim:
    (true, false). Skip animation. Value default is false.
  12. ajax:
    (true, false). Setting "true" if you want to use ajax to load content of tabs (Not apply for HTML Content type). Value default is false.
  13. view:
    (introtext, fulltext). Apply for Articles.
  14. jaclass:
    Input the class for each tab in format: 1:class1,2:class2. The supported class depend on the tab style.
  15. module:
    Apply for type="modules". Input module position which will display in tabs. For example: articleslatestload
  16. modulename:
    Apply for type="module". Input one or more module names which are separated by comma. For example: mod_articles_news, mod_articles_latest
  17. ids:
    Apply for type="articles". Input one or more article IDs which are separated by comma. For example: 1, 2, 3, 4
  18. catid:
    Apply for type="articles". Input one catergory from which you want to display their articles in tabs. For example: 1
  19. maxitems:
    Maximum number of articles displaying

For Example tags:

1. Type = modules

{jatabs type="modules" module="position-7" position="top" mouseType="click" animType="animFade"} {/jatabs}

2. Type = module

{jatabs type="module" modulename="mod_menu, mod_login" position="left" widthTabs="150" animType="animMoveVir"} {/jatabs}

3. Type = content

{jatabs type="content" position="top" height="240" mouseType="mouseover" animType="animMoveHor"} [tab title="Entertainment"] <img src="images/sampledata/fruitshop/apple.jpg" alt="Sample image" align="left" class="caption" />... [/tab] [tab title="Travel"] <img src="images/sampledata/fruitshop/bananas_2.jpg" /> [/tab] [tab title="Artist"] <img src="images/sampledata/fruitshop/tamarind.jpg" /> [/tab] {/jatabs}

4. Type = articles

{jatabs type="articles" ids="25, 26, 27" ajax=true view="introtext" position="right" widthTabs=150 width=530 animType="animMoveVir"} {/jatabs}

5. Type = articles

{jatabs type="articles" catid="55" view="introtext" ajax=true position="bottom" animType="animMoveHor"} {/jatabs}

Upgrade Methods :

  1. Standard joomla uninstall / reinstall method. OR
  2. Module supports upgrade method. You can install new version directly over this version. Uninstallation is not required. Backup any customized file before upgrading, your settings would be saved though. OR
